tasks.title: Get Started with Vibex Task Manager
tasks.description: Learn how to use Vibex Task Manager to organize and track your project tasks. This is a sample task to help you get familiar with the system.

subtasks.title: Read the documentation
subtasks.description: Review the README.md file and documentation to understand available commands

subtasks.title: Create your first task
subtasks.description: Use 'vibex-task-manager add-task' to create your first real project task

tasks.details: This task will help you get familiar with the Vibex Task Manager system. Complete the subtasks in order to learn the basic workflow.
tasks.testStrategy: Manual verification that you can successfully use the basic commands and understand the task management workflow.
